info.title: Supreme Wallet API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Supreme Wallet application

get.description: Display a listing of all transactions.

post.description: Store a newly created transaction in storage.

get.description: Search and filter transactions with various parameters.

put.description: Update the specified transaction in storage.

delete.description: Remove the specified transaction from storage.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all registered users
get.description: Retrieve all users from the database.

post.description: Register a new user in the system.

422.description: Validation failed due to invalid input

parameters.name: user

422.description: Validation failed due to invalid input

get.summary: Search and filter users with pagination support
get.description: Search users by name, email, or role with customizable pagination

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search term for filtering users by name or email

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter users by their assigned role

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of users to return per page

200.description: Successfully retrieved filtered and paginated users

422.description: Validation failed due to invalid input

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email
